original_text: When Laban heard what Rachel said, he went quickly to meet Jacob, his sister's son. He put his arms round Jacob and he kissed him. Laban brought Jacob to his home. Jacob told Laban all his news.
korean_text: 라반이 그의 생질 야곱의 소식을 듣고 달려와서 그를 영접하여 안고 입맞추며 자기 집으로 인도하여 들이니 야곱이 자기의 모든 일을 라반에게 말하매

sentences.original_text: When Laban heard what Rachel said
sentences.korean_translation: 라반이 라헬이 말한 것을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: he went quickly to meet Jacob
He put his arms round Jacob
Laban brought Jacob to his home
Jacob told Laban all his news
